#include <stdio.h>

#include <stdlib.h>

 

int main(void)

{

         int MAX = 10;

int *a = (int *)malloc(MAX * sizeof(int));

int *b;

    

FILE *fp1;

FILE *fp2;

 

fp1 = fopen("a.txt","r");

if(fp1 == NULL)

{printf("error1");

    exit(-1);

}

 

    fp2 = fopen("b.txt","w");

if(fp2 == NULL)

{printf("error2");

    exit(-1);

}

 

int i = 0;

    int j = 0;

 

while(fscanf(fp1,"%d",&a[i]) != EOF)

{

i++;

j++;

if(i >= MAX)

{

MAX = 2 * MAX;

b = (int*)realloc(a,MAX * sizeof(int));

if(b == NULL)

{

printf("error3");

exit(-1);

}

a = b;

}

}

 

for(;--j >= 0;)

   fprintf(fp2,"%d\n",a[j]);

 

fclose(fp1);

fclose(fp2);

 

return 0;

 

 

}

#include<iostream>

 

usingnamespacestd;

 

intPartition (int*L,intlow,int high)

{

inttemp = L[low];

intpt = L[low];

 

while (low < high)

{

while (low < high && L[high] >= pt)

--high;

L[low] = L[high];

while (low < high && L[low] <= pt)

++low;

L[low] = temp;

}

L[low] = temp;

 

returnlow;

}

 

voidQSort (int*L,intlow,int high)

{

if (low < high)

{

intpl = Partition (L,low,high);

 

QSort (L,low,pl - 1);

QSort (L,pl + 1,high);

}

}

for (int i = 1; i <= sum;i++)

cout << narry[i] << '\t';

{

cout << "And it's place is:" ;

for (i = 0;i < sum;i++)

return0;

Linklist *unio(Linklist *p,Linklist *q){

linklist *R,*pa,*qa,*ra;

pa=p;

qa=q;

R=ra=p;

while(pa->next!=NULL&&qa->next!=NULL){

if(pa->data>qa->data){

ra->next=qa;

qa=qa->next;

}

else{

ra->next=pa;

pa=pa->next;

}

}

if(pa->next!=NULL)

ra->next=pa;

if(qa->next!=NULL)

ra->next==qa;

return R;

}

bool fun( int a[], int n )

{

if( n==1 )

return true;

if( n==2 )

return a[n-1] >= a[n-2];

return fun( a,n-1) && ( a[n-1] >= a[n-2] );

}

int continumax(char *outputstr, char *inputstr)

{

char *in = inputstr, *out = outputstr, *temp, *final;

int count = 0, maxlen = 0;

 

while( *in != '\0' )

{

if( *in > 47 && *in < 58 )

{

for(temp = in; *in > 47 && *in < 58 ; in++ )

count++;

}

else

in++;

 

if( maxlen < count )

{

maxlen = count;

count = 0;

final = temp;

}

}

for(int i = 0; i < maxlen; i++)

{

*out = *final;

out++;

final++;

}

*out = '\0';

return maxlen;

}

int getlen(char *s){

    int n;

    for(n = 0; *s != '\0'; s++)

           n++;

    return n;

}

void reverse(char s[])

{

   int c,i,j;

   for(i = 0,j = getlen(s) - 1; i < j; i++,j--){

       c = s[i];

       s[i] = s[j];

       s[j] = c;

   }

}

void itoa(int n,char s[])

{

   int i,sign;

   if((sign = n) < 0)

        n = -n;

   i = 0;

   do{/*ä»¥ååºç”Ÿæˆæ•°å­—*/

      s[i++] = n%10 + '0';/*get next number*/

   }while((n /= 10) > 0);/*delete the number*/

 

   if(sign < 0)

      s[i++] = '-';

 

   s[i] = '\0';

   reverse(s);

}

           å¦‚ï¼šcombination(5,3)

  è¦æ±‚è¾“å‡ºï¼š543ï¼Œ542ï¼Œ541ï¼Œ532ï¼Œ531ï¼Œ521ï¼Œ432ï¼Œ431ï¼Œ421ï¼Œ321ï¼Œ

#include<stdio.h>

 

int pop(int *);

int push(int );

void combination(int ,int );

 

int stack[3]={0};

top=-1;

 

int main()

{

int n,m;

printf("Input two numbers:\n");

while( (2!=scanf("%d%*c%d",&n,&m)) )

{

fflush(stdin);

printf("Input error! Again:\n");

}

combination(n,m);

printf("\n");

}

void combination(int m,int n)

{

int temp=m;

push(temp);

while(1)

{

if(1==temp)

{

if(pop(&temp)&&stack[0]==n) //å½“æ ˆåº•å…ƒç´ å¼¹å‡º&&ä¸ºå¯èƒ½å–çš„æœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œå¾ªç¯é€€å‡º

break;

}

else if( push(--temp))

{

printf("%d%d%d  ",stack[0],stack[1],stack[2]);//Â§Ã¤Â¨Ã¬Â¤@?

pop(&temp);

}

}

}

int push(int i)

{

stack[++top]=i;

if(top<2)

return 0;

else

return 1;

}

int pop(int *i)

{

*i=stack[top--];

if(top>=0)

return 0;

else

return 1;

}

 

12ã€ç”¨æŒ‡é’ˆçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²â€œABCD1234efghâ€å‰åå¯¹è°ƒæ˜¾ç¤º

#include <stdio.h>

#include <string.h>

#include <dos.h>

int main()

{

    char str[] = "ABCD1234efgh";

    int length = strlen(str);

    char * p1 = str;

    char * p2 = str + length - 1;

    while(p1 < p2)

    {

        char c = *p1;

        *p1 = *p2;

        *p2 = c;

        ++p1;

        --p2;

    }

    printf("str now is %s\n",str);

    system("pause");

suffix    ä¸‹æ ‡

index     è¿”å›æœ€åçš„ä¸‹æ ‡åºå·

values    è¿”å›æœ€åçš„ä¸‹æ ‡å¯¹åº”çš„å€¼

start     ä»ç¬¬å‡ ä¸ªå¼€å§‹

K         é—´éš”

*/

int find_n(int a[],int R[],int K,int& index,int& values,int s=0) {

   int suffix;

   int front_node,current_node;

   suffix=0;

      if(s==0) {

      current_node=0;

      front_node=MAXLINE-1;

      }

      else {

      current_node=s;

      front_node=s-1;

      }

        while(R[front_node]!=front_node) {

            printf("%d\n",a[current_node]);

            R[front_node]=R[current_node];

            if(K==1) {

              current_node=R[front_node];

            }

            for(int i=0;i<K;i++){

               front_node=R[front_node];

            }

            current_node=R[front_node];

        }

 index=front_node;

 values=a[front_node];

 

 return 0;

}

int main(void) {

int a[MAXLINE],R[MAXLINE],suffix,index,values,start,i,K;

suffix=index=values=start=0;

a[i]=i;

R[i]=i+1;

}

find_n(a,R,K,index,values,2);

printf("the value is %d,%d\n",index,values);

return 0;

}

/* memcpy â”€â”€â”€ æ‹·è´ä¸é‡å çš„å†…å­˜å— */  

void memcpy(void* pvTo, void* pvFrom, size_t size)

{

void* pbTo = (byte*)pvTo;

void* pbFrom = (byte*)pvFrom;

ASSERT(pvTo != NULL && pvFrom != NULL); //æ£€æŸ¥è¾“å…¥æŒ‡é’ˆçš„æœ‰æ•ˆæ€§

ASSERT(pbTo>=pbFrom+size || pbFrom>=pbTo+size);//æ£€æŸ¥ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘çš„å†…å­˜æ˜¯å¦é‡å 

while(size-->0)

*pbTo++ == *pbFrom++;

return(pvTo);

}

#include<stdio.h>

#include<stdlib.h>

#include<string.h>

 

char *commanstring(char shortstring[], char longstring[])

{

int i, j;

 

char *substring=malloc(256);

 

if(strstr(longstring, shortstring)!=NULL)              //å¦‚æœâ€¦â€¦ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿”å›shortstring

return shortstring;  

 

for(i=strlen(shortstring)-1;i>0; i--)                 //å¦åˆ™ï¼Œå¼€å§‹å¾ªç¯è®¡ç®—

{

for(j=0; j<=strlen(shortstring)-i; j++){

memcpy(substring, &shortstring[j], i);

substring[i]='\0';

if(strstr(longstring, substring)!=NULL)

return substring;

}

}

return NULL;

}

{

}

struct node

{ int data;

struct node *front,*next;

};

æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªåŒå‘å¾ªç¯é“¾è¡¨Aï¼ŒBï¼ŒçŸ¥é“å…¶å¤´æŒ‡é’ˆä¸ºï¼špHeadA,pHeadBï¼Œè¯·å†™ä¸€å‡½æ•°å°†ä¸¤é“¾è¡¨ä¸­dataå€¼ç›¸åŒçš„ç»“ç‚¹åˆ é™¤

BOOL DeteleNode(Node *pHeader, DataType Value)

{

if (pHeader == NULL) return;

 

BOOL bRet = FALSE;

Node *pNode = pHead;

while (pNode != NULL)

{

if (pNode->data == Value)

{

if (pNode->front == NULL)

{

pHeader = pNode->next;

pHeader->front = NULL;

}

else

{

if (pNode->next != NULL)

{

pNode->next->front = pNode->front;

}

pNode->front->next = pNode->next;

}

 

Node *pNextNode = pNode->next;

delete pNode;

pNode = pNextNode;

 

bRet = TRUE;

//ä¸è¦breakæˆ–return, åˆ é™¤æ‰€æœ‰

}

else

{

pNode = pNode->next;

}

}

 

return bRet;

}

 

void DE(Node *pHeadA, Node *pHeadB)

{

if (pHeadA == NULL || pHeadB == NULL)

{

return;

}

 

Node *pNode = pHeadA;

while (pNode != NULL)

{

if (DeteleNode(pHeadB, pNode->data))

{

if (pNode->front == NULL)

{

pHeadA = pNode->next;

pHeadA->front = NULL;

}

else

{

pNode->front->next = pNode->next;

if (pNode->next != NULL)

{

pNode->next->front = pNode->front;

}

}

Node *pNextNode = pNode->next;

delete pNode;

pNode = pNextNode;

}

else

{

pNode = pNode->next;

}

}

}

 

31ã€ç¼–ç¨‹å®ç°ï¼šæ‰¾å‡ºä¸¤ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­æœ€å¤§å…¬å…±å­å­—ç¬¦ä¸²,å¦‚"abccade","dgcadde"çš„æœ€å¤§å­ä¸²ä¸º"cad" 

int GetCommon(char *s1, char *s2, char **r1, char **r2)

{

int len1 = strlen(s1);

int len2 = strlen(s2);

int maxlen = 0;

 

for(int i = 0; i < len1; i++)

{

for(int j = 0; j < len2; j++)

{

if(s1[i] == s2[j])

{

int as = i, bs = j, count = 1;

while(as + 1 < len1 && bs + 1 < len2 && s1[++as] == s2[++bs])

count++;

 

if(count > maxlen)

{

maxlen = count;

*r1 = s1 + i;

*r2 = s2 + j;

}

}

char* test3(long num) {

}

return buffer;

}

int s[N][N];

void main()

{

for( ; k < (N+1)/2; k++ )

{

while( j < N-k ) s[i][j++] = a++; i++; j--;

while( i < N-k ) s[i++][j] = a++; i--; j--;

while( j > k-1 ) s[i][j--] = a++; i--; j++;

while( i > k )   s[i--][j] = a++; i++; j++;

}

for( i = 0; i < N; i++ )

2 define MAX_N  100

int matrix[MAX_N][MAX_N];

 

/*

 *ï¼ˆx,yï¼‰ï¼šç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„åæ ‡

 * startï¼šç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„å€¼

 * nï¼šçŸ©é˜µçš„å¤§å°

 */

void SetMatrix(int x, int y, int start, int n) {

    int i, j;

 

    if (n <= 0)    //é€’å½’ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶

        return;

    if (n == 1) {  //çŸ©é˜µå¤§å°ä¸º1æ—¶

        matrix[x][y] = start;

        return;

    }

    for (i = x; i < x + n-1; i++)   //çŸ©é˜µä¸Šéƒ¨

        matrix[y][i] = start++;

 

    for (j = y; j < y + n-1; j++)   //å³éƒ¨

        matrix[j][x+n-1] = start++;

 

    for (i = x+n-1; i > x; i--)     //åº•éƒ¨

        matrix[y+n-1][i] = start++;

 

    for (j = y+n-1; j > y; j--)     //å·¦éƒ¨

        matrix[j][x] = start++;

 

    SetMatrix(x+1, y+1, start, n-2);   //é€’å½’

}

 

void main() {

   int i, j;

   int n;

 

   scanf("%d", &n);

   SetMatrix(0, 0, 1, n);

   

   //æ‰“å°èºæ—‹çŸ©é˜µ

   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {

      for (j = 0; j < n; j++)

printf("%4d", matrix[i][j]);

      printf("\n");

   }

}

int IsReverseStr(char *aStr)

{

int i,j;

int found=1;

if(aStr==NULL)

return -1;

j=strlen(aStr);

for(i=0;i<j/2;i++)

if(*(aStr+i)!=*(aStr+j-i-1))

{

found=0;

break;

}

return found;

}

#include <stdio.h>

int Josephu(int n, int m)

{

  int flag, i, j = 0;

  {

    while (flag < m)

    {

    }

    arr[j - 1] = 0;

    printf("ç¬¬%4dä¸ªå‡ºå±€çš„äººæ˜¯ï¼š%4då·\n", i, j);

  }

  free(arr);

  return j;

}

{

  scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);

  printf("æœ€åèƒœåˆ©çš„æ˜¯%då·ï¼\n", Josephu(n, m));

}

#include <stdio.h>

#include <malloc.h>

typedef struct Node

{

  int index;

  struct Node *next;

}JosephuNode;

int Josephu(int n, int m)

{

  int i, j;

  JosephuNode *head, *tail;

  head = tail = (JosephuNode *)malloc(sizeof(JosephuNode));

  for (i = 1; i < n; ++i)

  {

    tail->index = i;

    tail->next = (JosephuNode *)malloc(sizeof(JosephuNode));

    tail = tail->next;

  }

  tail->index = i;

  tail->next = head;

  

  for (i = 1; tail != head; ++i)

  {

    for (j = 1; j < m; ++j)

    {

      tail = head;

      head = head->next;

    }

    tail->next = head->next;

    printf("ç¬¬%4dä¸ªå‡ºå±€çš„äººæ˜¯ï¼š%4då·\n", i, head->index);

    free(head);

    head = tail->next;

  }

  i = head->index;

  free(head);

  return i;

}

int main()

{

  int n, m;

  scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);

  printf("æœ€åèƒœåˆ©çš„æ˜¯%då·ï¼\n", Josephu(n, m));

  system("pause");

  return 0;

}
